New York University Archives Collection of Course Bulletins
School of Continuing and Professional Studies Bulletin
School of Continuing and Professional Studies Bulletin

This website contains the SCPS bulletins from Summer 2014 to Fall 2015. Program areas covered include Applied Politics, Business, Creative Cities and Economic Development, Global Affairs, Health and Care Programs, Hospitality and Tourism, Languages and Humanities, Media Industry Studies and Design, Philanthropy and Fundraising, Real Estate, and Sports Management, Media, and Business.
